[quote=“pistolse, post:8, topic:235994”]lol it didnt work, it worked to make the shortcut and hidden the folder,
then when i rar the file it works to
but when i Extract it (unrar it) then try to Run the shortcut it goes: Searching For Bloodbarrage Client (RUN)

its like the file aint existing[/quote]

Hmm that’s weird >.< Does it work before you rar it?

EDIT:

Are you sure you did it exactly as I said cause I just tried raring it and put it in somewhere else and It works perfect…

This is only a suggestion

I could either keep helping you on here or give me a dl link and Ill try and fix it up

As I see you’re worried about leech but trust me I don’t leech I know what it feels like

You don’t gotta do it just whatever you choose

item.title: [HELP] How Do I Make My Client Closed? [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Hehe I couldn’t figure it out either =P You’re with me… But this is all I did

Start off with A folder and a folder inside of it

THE FOLDER INSIDE WILL BE YOU’RE CLIENT FOLDER

Then go into you’re client folder…

NOW DELETE THE COMPILE AND ALL THE JAVA FILES

Make a shortcut of run and copy it…

Go to the folder before you’re client folder (THE FOLDER THAT’S HOLDING CLIENT FOLDER)

and paste the shortcut to run there…

NOW TO MAKE THE CLIENT FOLDER INVISIBLE

You should already know this but incase I will just give you a little tut on this =/

Ok now to make it invisible this is very basic and simple…

Right click you’re client folder and click properties

Now a window should pop up

CLICK HIDDEN AND PRESS APPLY

When you press apply it will give you two options

One - Make this folder hidden

and

Two- Make the folder hidden with subfolders

Click Make the folder hidden with subfolders

Now you’re client is invisible =P

If you’re gonna release it you know what to do… Just go to the folder that’s holding all that stuff and rar it or something and put it up in a dl link

I’m not positive that this works but im pretty sure it will if it doesn’t please tell me and I’ll try figuring something out

Read full topic
